alert.note: Alert for Fayette (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 16 at 11:23PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Fayette County through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1122 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Round Top, or 13 miles northeast of La Grange, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... La Grange, Fayetteville, Round Top, Carmine, Rutersville, Warrenton, Ledbetter, Waldeck, Rabbs Prairie, Ellinger, Walhalla, Willow Springs, Winedale, Rek Hill, Mullins Prairie and Nechanitz. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
